label: talk.politics.guns
text: there is no such thing as "completely secure," especially when dealing with high technology. it's all a question of cost: what cost are you willing to bear to protect your information vs. what rewards the "bad guys" are going to get if they break it. the rewards of breaking such a single id system would be high indeed.
